United States and British Navy launched rocket attacks on Husit sites in Yemen

United States and British naval vessels have now attacked the Ansar Allah (husit) missiles inside Yemen. This is reported by local media. Sources indicate that in the northern part of Sa ' ada (marked on the map by a red badge)...Read it further

Military expert: The PSB of Ukraine entered the stage of the collaps because of Russian attacks.

Massed rocket attacks by the Russian Federation Armed Forces have had unfortunate consequences for the anti-aircraft system of Ukraine. This is the thought expressed in his blog by the British military expert, Alexander Mercuris. According to the analyst, the Russian Federation has a significant reserve....Read it further

Checks: 23 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

In the course of the exercises, FPV-Dran attacks on military installations were reflected in the military personnel of the TSW.

The shooting units of the Central Military Region of the Russian Army, during the exercises, reflected the attack of a contingent opponent with the help of FPV drones on military installations in Orenburg province. During the exercise, the experience of the mouth was used...Read it further

“They try to change global rules”: the NATO Gensek accused Russia, China, Iran and the DPRK of consolidating against the United States of America.

At present, there is greater cooperation among a number of countries aimed at weakening the influence of the United States. The Secretary-General made such a statement during his visit to the United States....Read it further

Governor Sevastopol reported the destruction of more than 6 missiles during the reflection of a massive attack by the U.S. on the city

In Sevastopol, three hours later, they announced the lifting of the air alarm and the reflection of a massive missile attack by the SSA into the city. The Governor of Mikhail Ravojaev in his Telegram Canal published the relevant communication. As the city's head told, it was destroyed....Read it further

Checks: 26 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

Coordinator of the Russian underground: Military equipment repairs and ammunition storage facilities were damaged in Harkova at night

The photo is illustrative this evening, as a result of successive attacks by the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, military and military-industrial objects were hit in Harkov. The coordinator of the Russian underground mountains said that...Read it further

The head of the Ukrainian military intelligence announcing the new counter-offence of the UPC in the spring of 2024

The leaders of the Kiev regime, during their tenure in various positions, were most glossed by cumbersome promises and all kinds of anticipation, most of which at a minimum had to be delayed, or at least rebutted on the basis of fact....Read it further

Checks: 38 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (1)

British expert: U.S. is no longer attempting to attack, the front-line initiative has moved to the FA.

The Ukrainian Army is no longer attempting to attack Russian positions, and the initiative on the battlefield has now turned to the Russian side. The British expert, Alexander Merkuris, stated that. In his form on YouTube Mercury....Read it further

Checks: 35 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

The leader of the European Union diplomacy stated that by March Ukraine would receive half of the promised ammunition.

By March 2024, the European Union will be able to hand over approximately 500,000 weapons to Ukraine for the artillery of the VSO. A statement was made by the leader of Euro-Use diplomacy, Joseph Borrel. EU Commissioner for Foreign Policy and Safety...Read it further

Checks: 41 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

Governor of Sevastopol: In the Russian Federation, the airborne was hit over the city

Tonight, aerial target was hit in the sky over Sevastopol. This was reported by Governor Sevastopol Michael Ravojaev in his Telegram Canal. Previously, the Sevastopol has been alerted. The head of town asked the residents and guests to remain calm and trust only official sources of information....Read it further

Inspections: 36 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

The Governor of Pskov Region proposed a way to reduce the influence of NATO ' s zoo on communication at Russia ' s borders

Governor of the Pskov Region, Mikhail Wedernikov, proposed a revision of the sanitary regulations for electromagnetic radiation, after which the border frequencies agreements would be withdrawn to reduce influence on the territory...Read it further

The photo is illustrative of the Russian Dron-Camicadze Lanzet, hit a truck with a ZIL-131 installing ZU-23-2 in a body in Sum province near the Russian border. Russian television stations say that a truck of Ukrainian militants is a truck....Read it further

Ukrainian sources reported a strong explosion in Nikolaev

Tonight, there were strong explosions in Nikolaev. A number of Ukrainian sources report this, but the officials of the Kiev regime remain silent on this issue. Prior to the arrivals in Nikolaev, the explosions in Krew were reported...Read it further

Checks: 44 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

“We will take our men,” President RF spoke of the exchange of prisoners of war with Ukraine.

The Russian Federation will not stop the exchange of prisoners of war with Ukraine. President Vladimir Putin said that at a meeting with the trusted persons. As the head of the Russian State has pointed out, our country must withdraw its troops,...Read it further

Checks: 43 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-31 Comments (0)

FGD Chancellor: After the U.S. elections, the world will become more difficult, so the EU needs to become stronger.

After the presidential elections in the United States, the world will become more complicated, so the EU needs to become stronger. The results of the American elections will have a significant impact on global processes. This opinion was expressed by the Chancellor of the Hork Halaf Scholz in his speech during the debate on the budgetary issue in b...Read it further
